eventDecorators.name: Bought
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when the user bought the MORPHEUS token.

eventDecorators.name: BuyTokenAddressChanged
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when buy token address is changed.

eventDecorators.name: ERC20TokensWithdrew
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when withdrew any ERC20 tokens.

eventDecorators.name: ICOClosed
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when ICO is closed.

eventDecorators.name: MaxTokenAmountsChanged
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when max token amount is changed.

eventDecorators.name: MorpheusICODeployed
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when contract is deployed.

eventDecorators.name: TokenPriceChanged
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when buy token price is changed.

functionDecorators.name: buy
functionDecorators.description: External function to buy the MORPHEUS token with cUSD. Current price is 0.15.

functionDecorators.name: changeBuyTokenAddress
functionDecorators.description: External function to change buy token address. This function can be called by only owner.

functionDecorators.name: changeMaxTokenAmount
functionDecorators.description: External function to change max token amount per user. This function can be called by only owner.

functionDecorators.name: changeTokenPrice
functionDecorators.description: External function to change token price. This function can be called by only owner.

functionDecorators.name: closeICO
functionDecorators.description: External function to close the ICO. This function can be called by only owner.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: withdrawERC20Tokens
functionDecorators.description: External function to withdraw any ERC20 tokens. This function can be called by only owner.
